description: The best of nature and tech Charm uses plants to capture CO₂ from the atmosphere. We convert biomass into a stable, carbon-rich liquid and then pump it deep underground. This removes CO₂ permanently from the atmosphere, out of reach of wildfires, soil erosion and land use change.

news.title: These Carbon Removal Companies Got the Energy Department’s Stamp of Approval
news.summary: The Department of Energy is advancing 24 companies in its purchase prize contest. What these companies are getting is more important than $50,000.
